source.308206a1:
countries=df.Entity.unique()
for i in countries:
    data=df[df.Entity==i]
    plt.xlabel('Year')
    plt.ylabel('Life expectancy')
    plt.title(i)
    plt.plot(data.Year,data['Life expectancy'],c='b')
    plt.show()
